lamparski.areabase.services

Class AreaDataService

  • java.lang.Object
    • Service
      • lamparski.areabase.services.AreaDataService

  • public class AreaDataService
extends Service
    A service for working with ONS data, asynchronously and all. Also defines a bunch of callback interfaces.
    Author:
    filip

      • areasForName

        public void areasForName(java.lang.String areaName,
                AreaDataService.AreaListCallbacks commlink)
        Gets a list of areas whose name contains the string areaName, ordered by the similarity to that string.
        Parameters:
        areaName - the name (partials accepted) for the area to find
        commlink - callbacks for returning the value or reporting errors.

      • subjectDump

        public void subjectDump(nde2.pull.types.Area area,
               java.lang.String subjectName,
               AreaDataService.SubjectDumpIface commlink)
        Fetches all the datasets in the given subject. May be slow the first time.
        Parameters:
        area - The area to fetch information for
        subjectName - The subject name
        commlink - A callback interface

      • datasetDump

        public void datasetDump(nde2.pull.types.Area area,
               nde2.pull.types.DataSetFamily family,
               AreaDataService.DatasetDumpCallbacks callbacks)
        Fetches all data for the dataset family given, referenced by the date ranges they cover.
        Parameters:
        area - The area to fetch information for
        family - The dataset family to download
        callbacks - A callback interface
